title: An Aged Mother
author: Wilson Kam, Chak Man
text: Later, a filial son came out of Boronai. He felt that this kind of behaviour of burying his parents alive was too inhumane. However, he had no strength to fight against this social trend. When his parents grew older, he had to dig a big hole, and build a house in it. He let his parents live in there secretly, sending all kinds of food and drinks every day
